title: Bank of Maharashtra opens branch on Supreme Court's premises
description: State-owned Bank of Maharashtra has opened a branch within the premises of the Supreme Court of India to cater to the financial needs of the court and its constituents. Chief Justice of India D Y Chandrachud inaugurated the branch, which offers internet-enabled kiosks and 24X7 locker facilities, alongside other tech-enabled solutions.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
